title: WTTF: T206 HOFer with SC350-460 factory 25 back and/or a T213-1 Coupon
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: WTTF: T206 HOFer with SC350-460 factory 25 back and/or a T213-1 Coupon
posts.post_content:
I want to trade for a T206 HOFer with a Sweet Caporal 350-460 factory 25 back.  Looking for a graded example by either PSA or SGC with good eye appeal and no back damage.

I'm looking for a HOFer that I don't have, but I will also take what I can get.

Email me with scans of what you have to: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

I will trade the following two cards for a SC350-460/25 HOFer I need:

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/Type%20Cards/1909-11T-206ClancyBillAB350framed.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/Type%20Cards/1909-11T-206BirminghamJoeSovereign3.jpg[/IMG]


Also looking for a graded example of a 1910 Coupon T213-1.  Any HOFer would be great, but a common works too.  Available for this card I have:

1) E95 Cicotte SGC 20 

and/or 

2)T206 Johnny Evers w/bat Chicago on Shirt with an American Beauty 350 (framed) back graded PSA 3.  

Email me for scans or to discuss a trade.
